page.title: 18 GAMES Chess and Dominoes.
page.content: CHESS.This is a game for two people played on a board with 64 alternate black and white sqwares.Each player has 16 black or white pieces consisting of a king,a queen,two bishops,two knights, two castles and eight pawns.The object of the game is to capture as many of the other player's pieces as you can and make it impossible for the king to move and win the game saying "Check Mate." DOMINOES.This game is played with 28 pieces marked in two halves with numbers from O to 6. The highest double e.g.6/6,starts and players try to get rid of all their pieces by putting a similar numbered half down next to a similar half on the table.The winner is the first person to play all his pieces while the others add up their remaining numbers.The highest total gives the loser.
